description:
The latest version of Purview Integration Runtime at build time.

      #### Supported Operating System

      Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2022, Windows 11
      Microsoft Purview Integration Runtime (Self-hosted) requires a 64-bit Operating System with .NET Framework 4.7.2 or above
summary: The latest version of Purview Integration Runtime
author: Microsoft Corporation
